trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports automatic background pagination and tracking content positions across repaginations in addition to the methods and properties of its own base class.
trans-unit.target: Itt egy absztrakt alaposztály, amely támogatja az automatikus háttér tördelési és követési tartalom pozíciók repaginations módszerek mellett a saját alaposztály tulajdonságai között.

trans-unit.source: By default, a DynamicDocumentPaginator will automatically pre-paginate content in the background (this process begins when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, which is the default setting).
trans-unit.target: Alapértelmezés szerint egy DynamicDocumentPaginator lesz automatikusan előzetesen megjelenítheti a háttérben tartalom (Ez a folyamat kezdődik, amikor <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>van `true`, vagyis az alapértelmezett beállítás).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, the layout will also be repaginated due to changes in content or changes in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>van `true`, elrendezését is bekezdésjelként változásokat vagy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> változásai miatt</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event occurs upon completion of pagination (or repagination) of one or more pages, such as in the following situations: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events occur as content is paginated in the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>esemény bekövetkeztekor tördelési (vagy oldalakra) egy vagy több lapok létrehozása után például ahogy az alábbi helyzetekben:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>események következik be, a tartalmat a rendszer a háttérben paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation, the event may occur upon paginating one or multiple pages (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> specifies which pages have been paginated).
trans-unit.target: Attól függően, hogy a megvalósítás az esemény fordulhat elő, egy vagy több oldal paginating (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> határozza meg, mely lapok rendelkezik lett paginated).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> may cause an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event to occur if the page specified has not been paginated.
trans-unit.target: -Hívások <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>vagy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>okozhat egy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>esemény fordul elő, ha a megadott oldal nem lett paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if background pagination is enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) but pagination has only been completed up to the third page, a call of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 6 will cause pages four, five, six, and seven to be paginated.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha engedélyezve van a háttérben tördelési (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) tördelési csak legfeljebb harmadik lapján, a hívás befejezése után, de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>6 argumentummal fog OK lapok négy, öt, 6 és 7-kell paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon completion, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event will be raised with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 4 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 4.
trans-unit.target: Befejezett egy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>eseményt generál a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>beállításainak <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 4 és <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 4.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: - With background pagination enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), a change in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> on flow-format content, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, may cause repagination and associated <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events.
trans-unit.target: -A háttérben tördelési engedélyezve (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), változása <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>adatfolyam-formátumban a tartalomhoz, például egy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, oldalakra okozhat, és a kapcsolódó <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>események.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> has no effect in repagination on fixed-format content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, where the visual page size does not affect the layout.
trans-unit.target: Vegye figyelembe, hogy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>nincs hatása a oldalakra rögzített formátumú tartalom, például a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, ahol a vizuális mérete nincs hatással az elrendezés.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event also occurs when background pagination is disabled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>esemény is akkor fordul elő, ha háttér tördelési le van tiltva.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is only one page of content and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `false`), calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 0 will result in two events: 1.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha a tartalom csak egy lap és <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>= `false`), hívó <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>0 argumentummal eredményez két esemény: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 1.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>esemény <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>beállításainak <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 0 és <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>esemény.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> for the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Ha felülbírálva származtatott osztályban található, visszaadja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> a megadott <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The object to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: Térjen vissza az objektumhoz a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> a.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> az adott objektum.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Felülbírálja a származtatott osztály, ha a megadott nulla alapú oldal számát adja vissza <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to the `contentPosition` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: Ha a lapok a `contentPosition` még nem lettek formázva, akkor lesz kell paginated szinkron módon előtt vissza a kért oldal száma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPageNumber, but with asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>GetPageNumber megegyezik, azonban aszinkron művelet hasonló funkciókat kínál.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom pozíciója akinek oldalszám van szükség.

trans-unit.source: An representing zero-based page number where the specified contentPosition appears.
trans-unit.target: Egy nulla alapú oldalszám képviselő ahol a megadott contentPosition jelenik meg.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aszinkron módon adja vissza (az ezen metódus vált ki a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> esemény) a megadott nulla alapú oldal száma <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Csak a módszer az aszinkron művelet megszakítására, megszakítja az összes aszinkron művelet.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: A ellentétben ez a módszer a más túlterheléssel: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer kiváltja a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>esemény.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The page number is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Az oldalszám az esemény az eseményargumentumok rendelkezésre álló kerülnek.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page number.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>arról, hogyan ezt a módszert használja az oldalszám beolvasandó.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom pozíciója akinek oldalszám van szükség.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aszinkron módon adja vissza (az ezen metódus vált ki a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> esemény) a megadott nulla alapú oldal száma <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer túlterhelés lehetővé teszi a aszinkron művelet megszakítására, ezzel nem szakítja meg minden aszinkron műveletek.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer kiváltja a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>esemény.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve the page number of a given `contentPosition` asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: A következő lépések bemutatják, hogyan lehet lekérni a lap számát egy adott `contentPosition` aszinkron módon történik.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Hozzon létre egy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>delegálásában, és hozzá kell adnia értesíti a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>események.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageNumberAsync specifying the `contentPosition` desired and a unique `userState` object that will be used to identify the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Hívja a GetPageNumberAsync megadása a `contentPosition` kívánt, valamint egy egyedi `userState` objektum, amely az aszinkron feladat azonosítására használható.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ha az esemény akkor következik be, és a delegált nevezik, hasonlítsa össze az esemény <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> tulajdonságot az eredeti GetPageNumberAsync `userState` paraméter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page number is ready.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> tulajdonsága egyezést mutat az eredeti GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, a művelet befejeződik, és készen áll az oldalszám.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> property will also match the original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parameter.) 5.
trans-unit.target: (A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> tulajdonság is fog egyezni az eredeti GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` paraméter.)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs> 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property contains the zero-based page number of the specified `contentPosition`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> tulajdonsága tartalmazza a megadott nulla alapú oldal száma `contentPosition`.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A> provides similar functionality as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, but for synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>hasonló funkciókat biztosítják <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, de szinkron művelethez.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position element to return the page number of.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom pozíció elem lap számának visszaadása.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Az aszinkron feladat egyedi azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>befejeződött.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the position of the specified page in the document's content.
trans-unit.target: Felülbírálja a származtatott osztály, amikor lekérdezi a megadott oldal pozíciója a dokumentum tartalma.

trans-unit.source: The page whose position is needed.
trans-unit.target: A lap, amelynek helyzetét van szükség.

trans-unit.source: A representing the position of page.
trans-unit.target: A pozíciója képviselő page .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pagination is performed automatically in the background in response to certain events, such as a change in page size.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy tördelési válaszul bizonyos események, például egy az oldalméret módosítása a háttérben automatikusan történik.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, pagination is performed in the background, raising <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> events as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Ha `true`, tördelési történik a háttérben előléptetése <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>és <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>megfelelő eseményeket.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Pagination of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content, as distinct from a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is not affected by changes to the visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tördelési <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>megkülönböztetve, attól <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>a visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> módosítása nem érinti</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> a tartalom

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background pagination is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha engedélyezve van a háttérben tördelési; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kiváltja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kiváltja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.EventArgs>, amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kiváltja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentumok teljes tartalmának rendelkezik lett paginated következik be.

trans-unit.source: When PaginationCompleted occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true` until a new pagination is initiated.
trans-unit.target: PaginationCompleted esetén <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>van `true` mindaddig, amíg egy új tördelési lehet kezdeményezni.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more content pages have been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor egy vagy több tartalom lapok rendelkezik lett paginated.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> properties <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> identify the range of pages paginated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>Tulajdonságok <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>azonosítása paginated oldalainak tartományát.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.
